subject: Prescription Medication Lawsuit Site - Every Drug Lawsuit is Listed Here
body:
Prescription Medication 
Lawsuit Site - Every Drug Lawsuit is Listed Here  
Do you know whether a drug you have taken or, are taking, 
  
  is the subject of a lawsuit due to it's side effects?
Every 
  Prescription Drug Involved in a Lawsuit is Listed on this Site

To 
  stop receiving announcements
